https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pRE6yMQPGpbKzTjMlgr8BKmR4gp.jpg Bong-ja is perfectly happy in her monotonous life of making and selling seaweed rolls near a train station. However, when a free spirited teenage girl enters her life and takes over her home, Bong-ja begins to feel the stirrings of love as disaster brews. Bongja
